comment: An element of a transitive set is a proper subset of it. Theorem 7.2 in [TakeutiZaring] p. 35. Unlike ~ tz7.2 , ~ ax-reg is required for its proof. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 13-Nov-2011.)
